name: SMOOSH
description:
hello and welcome to SMOOSH this is a Small FPS shooter for a School Project   remember this project is still in Build and is still in Development so this game contains some Bugs if you find a glitch or a bug Report it i appreciate it

Enjoy this game In 

TIP: You can register go to Settings then you can set your name Your name will Register in the System so After a Game you have to login again then its Reloading the Data of your profile and also When you Start your game again

TIP 2: This Game Has some Features that kids under 5 years Not may see Like Blood and Weapons So its your own Responsibility so i recommend this game for 7 year old people or higher

Become a General Fight others Fight Bots or Fight Zombies or mix them 

Rule your battle  
See you on the field Soldier

Game Maturity

----Minimal Specs----

i3 Proccesor

Intel Graphics Card 4000

RAM 4GB

and 1GB storage for Updates
